description:
HTML ONLY WORKS IN FIREFOX - SORRY!

Move: WASD

Aim Ladder: Mouse

Catch the stock brokers as they jump out of windows during the height of the great depression... yikes.

This is my submission for Ludum Dare 44. 

Theme: Your Life is currency

LD game page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/1929
